_sText: *********************************** Counter-Strike: Source *********************************** TITLE: CS:S Map - de_home4holidays AUTHOR: SM Sith Lord E-MAIL: smsithlord@yahoo.com WEBSITE: http://www.sithmercenaries.net FILENAME: de_home4holidays.bsp FILESIZE: 13.8 MB DATE RELEASED: December 23rd, 2006 AUTHOR: SM Sith Lord (smsithlord@yahoo.com) DESCRIPTION: Merry Christmas! You've returned to the scene of de_DomesticDispute, but this time its in the middle of a snowy blizard and santa has come and left the xmas cheer all over the place. You can see santa and his sleigh flying away from T spawn at the start of each round, if you're quick enough! CT's camp the crime scene (house) while T's try to destroy the evidence (waboom). If T's take too long to blow up evidence, the panic room unlocks and the CT's can escort the witness to safety to win. WARNING: Due to the layout of this map, it is intended for high-performance machines. Running it on a slower machine will result in unsatisfactory framerates in some spots. BUGS: * The snow falls even inside the house. Just think of it as magic xmas dust! * Nav mesh still isn't perfect, and bots can still see thru some objects they shouldn't. NOTICE: It has come to my attention that there is no working .nav file included within the bsp. Until I fix this problem, you can download the .nav file seperately by clicking here.
